title: O.D.2. - I cannot negotiate
brief_description: The second of two programmes showing the application of Organizational Development theory in the running of Sheldon High School, Oregon, USA. Shows what happens when there is dissension among the decision making body and the various ways that O.D. is used to resolve the situation.
